channel.title: How do i get the mqo model file when i only have mdl?
channel.description:
Well i guess the title says basicly what i'm having trouble with.
How do i get the mqo model file when i only have mdl?
Well ive got the models i just dont have them in [i]mqo[/i] only [i]mdl[/i] The only [i]mqo[/i] i have is the iron plate body but i want to edit iron [b]platelegs[/b], but im sure you can use normal character legs and just recolour them cant you? But if so wont you be mixing the characters legs and armour? Can someone please just answer my pleed. [b]~thanks~[/b]

item.title: How do i get the mqo model file when i only have mdl?
item.dc:creator: @r_o_l_l_cage r o l l cage
item.description:
@r_o_l_l_cage wrote:

Ok get DatMaker ( www.uppit.com/3L6I6B/ )
Open up the .mdl file
Click File-> Export MQO
Then open Meta ( www.metaseq.net/english/index.html )
Click Open and go to the same folder the .mdl file is located

If do this right you should be able to edit your Model

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get the mqo model file when i only have mdl?
